parameters.description: * Your i-parcel API key (visible in your Dashboard via the Integrate link.)

parameters.name: Reference
parameters.description: *  Reference number associated with the parcel

parameters.name: TrackingNumber
parameters.description: *  Parcel's Tracking Number

post.summary: Allows adding a reference number to a parcel

parameters.name: Currency
parameters.description: * The currency in which to issue the refund (should be in your shopper's currency).

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * The API key provided to you by i-parcel.

parameters.name: Notes
parameters.description: * Notes on this refund.

parameters.name: OriginalTrackingNumber
parameters.description: * The original tracking number of the parcel.

parameters.name: Reference
parameters.description: * An internal reference that you can apply to the refund.

parameters.name: RefundedBy
parameters.description: * The person authorizing the refund.

parameters.name: ReturnTrackingNumber
parameters.description: The tracking number of the return.

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: * The amount to refund.

post.summary: Global e-commerce merchants can issue returns with this API.

parameters.name: Country
parameters.description: The country in which to ban the item. This can be left blank or null to ban the item in all countries.

parameters.name: Delete
parameters.description: Designates that these are items are to be deleted instead of added.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your API key from i-parcel.

parameters.name: Sku
parameters.description: * The item to ban.

parameters.name: Skus
parameters.description: * A list of the skus to ban and their countries.

post.summary: Ban certain skus for all or specified countries.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your i-parcel API key (visible in your Dashboard via the Integrate link.)

parameters.name: TrackingNumber
parameters.description: *  Parcel's Tracking Number

parameters.name: UserNotes
parameters.description: Cancellation Notes

post.summary: Allows cancelling a parcel using its tracking number

parameters.name: AddressInfo
parameters.description: * The addresses of the sender and recipient. A recipient country and postcode is the minimum required for CheckItems. All fields are required for an actual order.

parameters.name: Billing
parameters.description: The billing address for the parcel

parameters.name: City
parameters.description: * The consignee's city.

parameters.name: CompanyCurrency
parameters.description: The unit representing your company's currency, if different from your account settings.

parameters.name: ControlNumber
parameters.description: Russia, Israel, Taiwan, Korea, South Africa, and Brazil require a control number from the consignee. This is also known as a Tax ID.

parameters.name: CountryCode
parameters.description: * The two-digit country code for the consignee.

parameters.name: CountryOfOrigin
parameters.description: The country where the item originated. This is typically where the item was last assembled or manufactured.

parameters.name: CurrencyCode
parameters.description: The currency in which to return prices.

parameters.name: CustHeightInches
parameters.description: * The height of the item in inches. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: CustLengthInches
parameters.description: * The length of the item in inches. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: CustWeightLbs
parameters.description: * The weight of the item in pounds. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: CustWidthInches
parameters.description: * The width of the item in inches. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: DDP
parameters.description: Whether to include duty and tax in the quote (and bill it to your shopper).

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: * The consignee's email address.

parameters.name: FirstName
parameters.description: * The consignee's first name.

parameters.name: HTSCode
parameters.description: * The international harmonization code of the item. This is not required if the item is already in our catalog and you've allowed a week for us to classify it.

parameters.name: Insurance
parameters.description: Whether to insure the order.

parameters.name: ItemDetailsList
parameters.description: * The items to apply to this request.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your API key

parameters.name: LastName
parameters.description: * The consignee's last name.

parameters.name: OrderReference
parameters.description: An order reference for your own internal tracking.

parameters.name: OriginalPrice
parameters.description: * The price of the item in your currency.

parameters.name: OtherDiscount
parameters.description: Any discounts you want to apply to the order.

parameters.name: OtherDiscountCurrency
parameters.description: The currency in which you'd like to apply the discount.

parameters.name: ParcelID
parameters.description: An optional parcel id.

parameters.name: Phone
parameters.description: * The consignee's phone number.

parameters.name: PostCode
parameters.description: * The consignee's postal code.

parameters.name: ProductDescription
parameters.description: * A description of the item. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: PromoCode
parameters.description: A promotional or coupon code that can have special pricing rules as configured in the Dashboard.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: * The quantity of this item being shipped.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The consignee's province/region/state.

parameters.name: SKU
parameters.description: * The sku identifier for the item.

parameters.name: ServiceLevel
parameters.description: The shipping type (115 = i-parcel UPS Select, 112 = i-parcel UPS Express)

parameters.name: Shipping
parameters.description: The shipping address for the parcel

parameters.name: ShopperCurrency
parameters.description: The shopper's currency. The quote response will be converted to this currency.

parameters.name: Street1
parameters.description: * Line 1 of the consignee's street address.

parameters.name: Street2
parameters.description: * Line 2 of the consignee's street address.

parameters.name: ValueCompanyCurrency
parameters.description: * The value of the item in your currency. Not required if your item is already in our catalog.

parameters.name: ValueShopperCurrency
parameters.description: The value of the item in the shopper's currency. Not required if the item is already in our catalog.

post.summary: Returns item validity and pricing from our version of your product catalog.

post.summary: Get exchange rates converted from your company's base currency. Exchange rates are updated every day at midnight GMT.

parameters.description: The amount to return in your shopper's currency. This won't be authorized until AuthorizeReturn is called.

parameters.description: * The parcel id of the returned quote.

parameters.name: Sku
parameters.description: * The sku of the item to return.

parameters.name: TrackingNumber
parameters.description: * The original tracking number to the order.

post.summary: Quotes shipping, tax, and duty on a list of items for the given shipping address.

parameters.name: Discount
parameters.description: If the original order has a discount, you can specify how much of the discount to carry over to the second parcel. If this is more than the original discount, it will be capped at the original discount (and the first split will have a discount of 0).

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your i-parcel API key (visible in your Dashboard via the Integrate link.)

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the item.

parameters.name: Sku
parameters.description: * The sku of the item.

parameters.name: SkuList
parameters.description: * The items and quantities to copy into the first split. The difference will become the second split.

parameters.name: TrackingNumber
parameters.description: * The tracking number of the parcel you'd like to split.

post.summary:
Splits the contents of a parcel into two new parcels with their own tracking numbers.
            To split a parcel more than two ways, simply call this service again on the newly split parcels.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your i-parcel API key (visible in your Dashboard via the Integrate link.)

parameters.name: NewTrackingNumber
parameters.description: * The New tracking number.

parameters.name: OriginalTrackingNumber
parameters.description: * The Original tracking number of the parcel.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: The quantity of the item.

parameters.name: Sku
parameters.description: * The sku of the item.

parameters.name: SkuList
parameters.description: * The items and quantities.

parameters.name: SplitParcelList
parameters.description: * List of parcels to split original into.

post.summary: Allows a parcel a parcel into a list of parcels.

parameters.name: Attribute1
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: Attribute2
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: Attribute3
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: Attribute4
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: Attribute5
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: Attribute6
parameters.description: An optional attribute.

parameters.name: CountryOfOrigin
parameters.description: The item's country of manufacture.

parameters.name: CurrentPrice
parameters.description: * The price of the item in your local currency. This field is required if submitting a new item.

parameters.name: Delete
parameters.description: Flag this as true to delete this item from the catalog. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: DimensionUnit
parameters.description: The unit representing the item's Length, Width, and Height. The default is the standard weight unit for your country.

parameters.name: HSCodeUS
parameters.description: The US harmonization code for the item. If missing, our classifications department will add it within approximately a week.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: The height of the item in inches. Required for new items unless you specify weight. You can provide a unit other than inches in the DimensionUnit field.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your API key

parameters.name: Length
parameters.description: The length of the item in inches. Required for new unless you specify weight. You can provide a unit other than inches in the DimensionUnit field.

parameters.name: ProductName
parameters.description: * A brief description of the product to aid customs in identifying your parcel's contents.

parameters.name: ProductURL
parameters.description: The url to the item in your e-commerce store. This is not required, but is recommended to help us classify it faster.

parameters.name: SKN
parameters.description: The SKN of the item.

parameters.name: SKU
parameters.description: * The item sku as it is presented on your e-commerce store.

parameters.name: SKUs
parameters.description: * A list of the items to submit.

parameters.name: ShipAlone
parameters.description: Will the item ship separately from other items in the order? Setting this to true will allow your shopper to exceed the weight limit when adding to their cart. You must split the parcel if the order exceeds the weight limit.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.description: The item weight. Required for new items unless you specify dimensions. Defaults to your country's weight unit unless you specify WeightInKilos or WeightUnit.

parameters.name: WeightInKilos
parameters.description: Set this to true if the Weight parameter above is in kilos, or set WeightUnit to "k".

parameters.name: WeightUnit
parameters.description: The unit representing the item's Weight.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The width of the item in inches. Required for new items unless you specify weight. You can provide a unit other than inches in the DimensionUnit field.

post.summary: Add to or update your catalog.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: * Your i-parcel API key (visible in your Dashboard via the Integrate link.)

parameters.name: KitItemList
parameters.description: * The list of items contained in the kit.

parameters.name: KitList
parameters.description: * A list of kits to submit.

parameters.name: ParentSku
parameters.description: * The sku of the kit that contains items.

parameters.name: Quantity
parameters.description: * The quantity of this item in the kit.

parameters.name: Sku
parameters.description: * The kit item's sku.

post.summary: A kit request specifying items that are part of a kit.
